scenes.action_text:
The Crying Game 
  The Crying Game FADE IN:  EXT. CARNIVAL - DAY  A loudspeaker playing Percy Sledge's "When a Man Loves a Woman," as we see a carnival in the distance - with a Ferris Wheel turning round and round. A black man is by a stall. On his arm is an Irish girl with blond hair. The black man is drunk, and is tossing rings around
